screenshots.caption: Before you use the application, you need to log in with your account information.
You can upload files from your computer to the cloud storage, which you can make public or keep private.
The Account Manager tab displays information about the total used storage space in your account.
The File Manager tab displays all of the files in your cloud storage and individual file statistics.
The Search Engine tab displays files uploaded and made public by other members which can be streamed or downloaded.
The built in media player allows you to stream your content from your cloud storage.

name: Easy Uploads
short_description:
Easy Uploads is a versatile and easy to use piece of software tailored to help you easily upload, download, and stream an unlimited amount of files on the Internet.

Easy Uploads is a colorful and easy to use application and although brightly colored and attractive, no customization such as resizing or changing the position of the main window can be done to the interface at this time. 

In order to access your storage account, the application requires you to log in with your username and password.

Every time you upload a file, you have the option to keep it personal or to share it with the public.
The upload process is quite simple and easy, even for inexperienced users. All you have to do is to browse for your file, input a title and pick a category, and then click the Upload Button.

Selecting a category for your files helps you when searching for a specific file on your cloud storage, narrowing the search field quite a bit.

Try Easy Uploads It's Free.
summary: Upload and share files online with unlimited free file hosting
